sign_in.title: Sign in
sign_in.description: We need your username and password to Sign In

forgot_password.title: Forgot password
forgot_password.description: Type your authorised email address to receive reset password link.

verify_otp.title: Verify OTP
verify_otp.description: Enter the passcode you just received on your email address ending with {{email}}

create_password.title: Create password
create_password.description: Type your new strong password. Your password must include: One capital letter & one small letter at least, One special character & Minimum 8 digits long.

select_account.title: Welcome Back
select_account.description: We are excited to have your back. Log in now and access your account.

dashboard.title: Logged In Successfully!
dashboard.description: You are now logged in to your account.

four_zero_four.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
